titulo: Spanish Short Stories for Beginners: More Than 500 Short Stories in 10 Easy to Read Stories (Spanish Edition)
descripcion:
This book contains 10 enjoyable short stories of about 1,000 words each, along with their respective vocabulary lists of relevant words translated into English. Each story also includes instructions on how to listen to them, improve your comprehension skills, and figure out the vocabulary before consulting the glossaries.
In this book you will find:
